channel.title: Albums on Sibelclan
channel.description: Recent content in Albums on Sibelclan

item.title: Addicted
item.description: “We just love to play our instruments,” observes Petrucci. “That never goes away. I love to be creative, write, and exercise that part of my mind. We’ve been able to do this for a long time, and we don’t take it for granted. Whenever we get together, we know we can’t disappoint ourselves or our fans, so we manage to try even harder.” “We approach every album like it’s our first,” adds LaBrie.
